_PAGE_FILTER_CURRENCY_ARGUMENTS_DIGIT_GR: Indicates whether digit grouping is enabled to insert thousands separators in the formatted string
_PAGE_FILTER_CURRENCY_ARGUMENTS_DIGITS_: The number of decimal places in the formatted string
_PAGE_FILTER_CURRENCY_ARGUMENTS_SUFFIX_: The suffix added to the formatted string to denote the currency
_PAGE_FILTER_CURRENCY_ARGUMENTS_VALUE_: The numeric value to be formatted as currency
_PAGE_FILTER_CURRENCY_DESCRIPTION_: The function filterCurrency is a specialized extension of the filterFloat function and serves to format numeric values as currency. It accepts a numeric value and returns a string that represents the value with the specified currency, number of decimal places, a suffix, and optional digit grouping (thousands separator). If the numeric value is not specified (null or undefined), an empty string is returned. This function is designed to be extended for many currencies.
